item.title: Installation
item.description: Binary packages You can download the latest binary package from here or from the GitHub release page. Linux (x64) 1.) Download the latest version: reno-linux-x64.zip 2.) Run it: ./reno Generic (Java) 1.) Download the latest version: reno-0.1.0.jar 2.) Run it: java -jar reno-0.1.0.jar

item.title: Usage
item.description: Usage: reno dump reno update reading notes extractor Options and flags: --help Display this help text. --version, -v Print the version number and exit. Subcommands: dump Dump the annotations from the given Pdf update update the notes in the Org-file with new annotations from the Pdf

item.title: Contact / Support
item.description: Contact Check my GitHub Profile for my mail address. Send me an direct message on twitter. Use keybase to contact me. Support If you have any questions, trouble or other input, feel free to contact me directly (see Contact) or open a issue@github.
